title: Reference Asset
description: A reference asset that provides creative context. Carries visual materials (mood boards, product shots, example creatives) with semantic roles that tell creative agents how to use them.

url.description: URL to the reference asset (image, video, or document)

enumDescriptions.style_reference: Match the visual style of this asset
enumDescriptions.product_shot: Include this product in the creative
enumDescriptions.example_creative: Example of a similar creative execution
enumDescriptions.logo: Logo to use in the creative
enumDescriptions.strategy_doc: Strategy or planning document for context

role.description: How the creative agent should use this asset

description.description: Human-readable description of the asset and how it should inform creative generation
